title: Everyone should make a list of names
body: on these boards they suspect either works for Riot Games or is affiliated with them. I would love to share with you.

replies.body:
I seriously think you need help. Like actual mental help from a professional.

Although you might just write them off as being part of the "conspiracy" too.

Yes because it's obviously a conspiracy against you.
Add my name in, I'm obviously Riot Tryndameryzeddler in disguise.

My friend Nep2une. You already know you're on this list. >3

along with nerak23

You know, because rioters dont have a huge "RIOT GAMES" tag?

.....

Inb4 i am accused of being part of the conspiracy because i denied it exists. Cant argue with the insane.
the OP is thinking they use un marked accounts to spy on him.
